statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x , -17 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} - 1 , -5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 4 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - x + 3 , -6 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
